name: Brazilian Association of Animal Protein
membership: ABPA does not belong to any other association.
goal: ABPA is a non-profit organization composed of the Brazilian producers and exporters of poultrymeat, pigmeat and eggs. ABPA has 140 members and works for the continuous development of its industries, ensuring their quality and assisting them in reaching new markets.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food Information to Consumers

Country of Origin Labelling

Food safety initiatives

Animal welfare initiatives
